job description: Job DescriptionJob DescriptionJob #: 914894 Apex Systems, the nation's 2nd largest Information Technology staffing firm, has an opportunity for a Senior Data Analyst to work for one of our clients in Deerfield Beach, FL. General details below are listed below. If interested in this position, please send a resume to Samantha Kidby- skidby@apexsystems.com Role: Senior Data Analyst Duration: 3-6 month contract Address: Deerfield Beach, FL Job Description: Elicit, understand, interpret and represent business requirements for data, information delivery and analytics, data integration, metadata, training, service levels, data quality, and performance Act as the conduit between the customer and technical teams to ensure requirements are understood Understand source systems and its data models Work with architects to translate requirements into technical specifications Validate that data integration, data movement, and warehouse meets requirements and service-level agreements Develop source to target mappings for data lineage Analyze data to validate business domains and requirements Conduct data profiling and ensure data quality requirements are accurate and complete Act in an advisory capacity in data model reviews, architecture approach and solution design to ensure high quality deliverables Coordinate prototype reviews Partner with management and business units on innovative ways to successfully utilize data and related tools to advance business objectives Provide technical guidance and mentoring to business and data analysts Execute and promote data management strategy Work with Quality Assurance teams in defining the QA strategy, test plans and use cases to validate data Communicate planned and unplanned activities to appropriate parties as needed Requirements: 7+ years experience working as a BI analyst or data analyst leveraging BI tools in a centralized data warehouse environment 5-7+ years hands-on experience working with SQL with an understanding of different data structures (flat files and RDMS) 3+ years experience with data modeling concepts and techniques Proven experience on projects involving data integration, data warehousing, data cleansing and data conversion process and/or tools Experience working with Cognos v.8.x or higher or similar BI tool Experience working with Teradata Data Warehouse or other RDMS Certification in Data Management (CDMP) or Business Intelligence (CBIP) is a plus Well versed in data management concepts, data lifecycle and methodologies Knowledge of data integration and data warehousing concepts for advancing business insights and data driven decisions Working knowledge of project management principles a plus Excellent interpersonal skills with the ability to build relationships within and between individuals and cross-functional teams Ability to understand the unique needs of the customer and translate to actionable results while delivering high quality outcomes Strong desire to understand the organization, its industry, and its strategies Skillful at applying business and technical skills to drive innovation and performance improvement Understands and demonstrates the company's core values of Communication, Consideration, Cooperation, Accountability and Innovation EEO Employer Apex is an Equal Employment Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Apex will consider qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of applicable law. If you have visited our website in search of information on employment opportunities or to apply for a position, and you require an accommodation in using our website for a search or application, please contact our Employee Services Department at 844-463-6178
